mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(a.START_DATE, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(a.END_DATE, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS END_DATE, TO_CHAR(a.OPEN_DATE, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS OPEN_DATE, place.PLACE_NAME AS PLACE_NAME, home_team.TEAM_NAME AS HOME_TEAM_NAME, home_team.LOGO_IMAGE AS HOME_TEAM_LOGO, away_team.TEAM_NAME AS AWAY_TEAM_NAME, away_team.LOGO_IMAGE AS AWAY_TEAM_LOGO FROM APPLY a LEFT JOIN TEAM home_team ON a.PLACE_SEQ = home_team.PLACE_SEQ LEFT JOIN TEAM away_team ON a.AWAY_TEAM_SEQ = away_team.TEAM_SEQ LEFT JOIN PLACE place ON a.PLACE_SEQ = place.PLACE_SEQ WHERE a.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ = 3 order by start_date

SELECT a.START_DATE, a.END_DATE, a.OPEN_DATE, a.PLACE_SEQ, home_team.TEAM_NAME AS HOME_TEAM_NAME, away_team.TEAM_NAME AS AWAY_TEAM_NAME FROM APPLY a LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM home_team ON a.PLACE_SEQ = home_team.PLACE_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM away_team ON a.AWAY_TEAM_SEQ = away_team.TEAM_SEQ WHERE a.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ = 4
